data.text: This is fantastic! I'd love to see this happen here in NZ!
data.title: Kiwi charities spurred on by world-first scheme to fund sanitary items at schools

data.text:
Why? What's changed?
If some parents prioritised their children's lives after they've had them, I believe this wouldn't be an issue. 
The $80 spent a week on ciggies would, I'm sure, fund thus...

data.text: Where does this never-ending call for more and more of my hard-earned money stop ? Why do special interest groups have a greater right to my earnings than I do ?
data.title: Kiwi charities spurred on by world-first scheme to fund sanitary items at schools

data.text: So three out of four can afford to pay themselves but will now get them free.
